channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: More abandoned signage, 30th September
item.description:
As well as the various already reported abandoned signs, sandbags, cones & lights on the bypass between Glos Biz Park & Zoons Road, this sign & sandbag has been here for months! On bridge at traffic lights at junction of Glos Biz Park, Brockworth, Hucclecote Road & said bypass. Perhaps Highways could do a thorough & efficient job & pick all the abandoned items in 1 go!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Huge pothole on A40 just before dualled section, 30th September
item.description:
This pothole has bent my alloy wheel and damaged the tyre on 28/09/2025 - this section of road is national speed limit, almost impossible to avoid and guarantees vehicle damage when hit. I had the misfortune for this to occur at night, nowhere near home.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction caused by tree problem, 30th September
item.description:
Dangerous part-fallen tree leaning across path leaning on much smaller tree
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 30th September
item.description:
2 trees outside property are blocking light plus very large now after 18 years.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 30th September
item.description:
Customer reporting concrete is crumbling/degraded around a manhole cover in the verge at location - has placed a piece of plywood over it
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approx 12" pothole on the edge of the road, 30th September
item.description:
Just outside house number 132
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole has caused immense financial distress, 30th September
item.description:
Pothole was just before turn off to Kilham lane. Pothole had damaged the car in front of us as well. This pothole was completely unavoidable, we hit it in our Ferrari and are now being quoted over Â£5000 to fix it!!! This is unbelievable. We want to claim this money back. Completely unacceptable and incredibly dangerous to have a road like this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Its not a pothole but a very disguised/hidden dip., 30th September
item.description:
Just past Chargrove Lane on Up Hatherley Road,Cheltenham there is a very large dip in the road which surprises car drivers as the dip is not actually shown as a POTHOLE The dip is just adjacent to a 5 barred gate. The dip can only get worse and is a danger to cyclists and motor cyclists as again the dip cannot be seen until you are upon it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Up Hatherley Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
